intro: Brachystelma arnotii, commonly known as the Orange-Striped Carpet, is a member of the Aizoaceae family and is native to South Africa. It is a small, mat-forming succulent that typically grows in rocky or sandy soils. The plant features fleshy, cylindrical stems with distinctive orange and green striped patterns. Its flowers are small, yellowish-green, and appear in clusters during the cooler months. Brachystelma arnotii is well adapted to arid environments and requires minimal water once established.
